attributes.background:
Trying to get dental treatment is near on impossible , cuts to nhs services are appalling ,where will it end. people are resorting to pulling there own teeth out or suffering in pain 
.this must be stopped 
Please sign and make a difference for all in need of a fairer nhs dental service

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about receiving dental treatment through NHS, but we're not sure exactly what reforms you'd like the Government or Parliament to make.
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
